review: I have been using Netflix on my TV via my PS3 for quite some time now and I have to say that, while the interface itself, on-screen, is the same visually, the picture via the Fire TV Stick is much cleaner with less freezing and stutter and quicker load times. Add to that all the other features in the Amazon Fire TV Stick and I am very pleased. I do wish there were more Prime movies and TV Shows for the annual price i am paying, but overall I am still very happy.My only complaint, and the only reason this did not get 5 stars, is that there should be at least the option for a "universal" remote available that can work with my TV, DVR, and other devices, as well as the option to connect an external hard drive to the  Fire TV Stick for downloads. I understand the larger, more expensive  Fire TV box has that, but it would be simple enough to include an additional USB or HDMI output to allow connection of ones own backup drive.
